title: [BUG]AuthenticationException: Authentication failed. cannot open experiment on web ui.

labels.name: needs author feedback
labels.description: Issue is waiting for the author to respond

body:
Thank you for submitting an issue. Please refer to our [issue policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)
for information on what types of issues we address. For help with debugging your code, please refer to [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/mlflow).

Please fill in this template and do not delete it unless you are sure your issue is outside its scope.

### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**:
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:centos 
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**:source
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: 1.4.0
- **Python version**:3.6
- **npm version, if running the dev UI**:
- **Exact command to reproduce**:

### Describe the problem
I launched a MLFlow server for tracking experiment by
```bash
mlflow server --default-artifact-root sftp://username@SAME_IP:/dat/jhe/mlflow --backend-store-uri file:///dat/jhe/mlruns -h SAME_IP -p 12303
```
and log artifact successfully.
however, when I tried to get into the experiment to see matrices and parameters from the web ui, it raise the follow error in command line.
```bash
(dev) [jhe@sim03 ~]$ mlflow server --default-artifact-root sftp://username@SAME_IP:/dat/jhe/mlflow --backend-store-uri file:///dat/jhe/mlruns -h SAME_IP -p 12303
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265406] [INFO] Starting gunicorn 19.9.0
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265406] [INFO] Listening at: http://SAME_IP:12303 (265406)
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265406] [INFO] Using worker: sync
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265409] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 265409
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265410] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 265410
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265412] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 265412
[2020-02-23 20:10:54 +0800] [265413] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 265413
2020/02/23 20:13:24 ERROR mlflow.server: Exception on /ajax-api/2.0/preview/mlflow/model-versions/search [GET]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2446, in wsgi_app
    response = self.full_dispatch_request()
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1951, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1820, in handle_user_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/_compat.py", line 39, in reraise
    raise value
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1949, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.dispatch_request()
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1935, in dispatch_request
    return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 137, in wrapper
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 581, in _search_model_versions
    model_versions_detailed = _get_model_registry_store().search_model_versions(
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'search_model_versions'
2020/02/23 20:13:24 ERROR mlflow.server: Exception on /ajax-api/2.0/preview/mlflow/artifacts/list [GET]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2446, in wsgi_app
    response = self.full_dispatch_request()
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1951, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1820, in handle_user_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/_compat.py", line 39, in reraise
    raise value
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1949, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.dispatch_request()
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1935, in dispatch_request
    return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 137, in wrapper
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 394, in _list_artifacts
    artifact_entities = _get_artifact_repo(run).list_artifacts(path)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 137, in wrapper
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 428, in _get_artifact_repo
    return get_artifact_repository(run.info.artifact_uri)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/artifact/artifact_repository_registry.py", line 102, in get_artifact_repository
    return _artifact_repository_registry.get_artifact_repository(artifact_uri)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/artifact/artifact_repository_registry.py", line 71, in get_artifact_repository
    return repository(artifact_uri)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/artifact/sftp_artifact_repo.py", line 56, in __init__
    self.sftp = pysftp.Connection(**self.config)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pysftp/__init__.py", line 143, in __init__
    self._transport.connect(**self._tconnect)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/paramiko/transport.py", line 1333, in connect
    self.auth_publickey(username, pkey)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/paramiko/transport.py", line 1580, in auth_publickey
    return self.auth_handler.wait_for_response(my_event)
  File "/home/jhe/env/dev/lib/python3.6/site-packages/paramiko/auth_handler.py", line 250, in wait_for_response
    raise e
paramiko.ssh_exception.AuthenticationException: Authentication failed.
```

any thoughts?
